property.name: fs.default.name
property.description: The name of the default file system. Either the literal string "local" or a host:port for DFS.

property.name: dfs.name.dir
property.description: Determines where on the local filesystem the DFS name node should store the name table.

property.name: dfs.data.dir
property.description: Determines where on the local filesystem an DFS data node should store its blocks. If this is a comma- or space-delimited list of directories, then data will be stored in all named directories, typically on different devices.

property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: How many copies we try to have at all times. The actual number of replications is at max the number of datanodes in the cluster.

property.name: mapred.local.dir
property.description: The local directory where MapReduce stores intermediate data files. May be a space- or comma- separated list of directories on different devices in order to spread disk i/o.

property.name: mapred.system.dir
property.description: The shared directory where MapReduce stores control files.

property.name: mapred.temp.dir
property.description: A shared directory for temporary files.
